mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS pid,A.PRODUCTNAME productName,A.THUMB thumb,A.PRICE price,B.ID AS cid,B.AMOUNT amount,B.INDATE indate, ( SELECT CATENAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE ID=(SELECT CATEID FROM CATEMAP WHERE ETCTABLE='PRODUCT' AND ETCID=A.ID)) catename FROM PRODUCT A ,CART B WHERE A.ID=B.PRODUCTID AND B.USERID=#{userid}
